name: colonially
content:

in a way that relates to or involves colonialism (= a system in which a country or area is controlled politically by another country) : There is a long history of business links that flow across the colonially imposed borders between the two countries. These colonially inherited economic structures did not function in the interests of the continent’s people.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are more than 200 different tribes within the country's colonially inherited borders. He became associated with a group of artists who were working in Trinidad's colonially stratified society.
